User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the CityFind application. Can be a business owner or a buyer.

uid.description: The unique user ID from Firebase Authentication.

role.description: The user's role in the application.

address.description: Full address of the user or business.

city.description: City where the user or business is located.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

isAdmin.description: Flag indicating if the user has administrator privileges.

businessName.description: Name of the user's business. Required for business roles.

category.description: Primary business category. Required for business roles.

fullName.description: Full name of the user. Required for the 'buyer' role.

purchaseHistory.description: A list of unique 14-digit identification numbers for products purchased by a buyer.

ghostCoins.description: The number of reward coins a buyer has earned.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product line or brand listed by a business.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Product entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this product.

name.description: Name of the product line or brand.

description.description: Detailed description of the product line.

category.description: The business category this product belongs to.

status.description: The current status of the product.

inventory.description: Total inventory count for all varieties of this product.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Category entity.

name.description: Name of the category (e.g., Food, Drinks, Electronics).

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon for the category.

order.description: The display order of the category.

definition.description: Stores all user profiles, including businesses and buyers.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores the list of available business categories. Typically managed by an admin.

params.name: categoryId
params.description: The unique identifier for the category.

definition.description: Stores products listed by a specific business user. Path provides ownership context.

params.name: userId
params.description: The UID of the business user who owns this product.

params.name: productId
params.description: The unique identifier for the product.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore structure is designed for clear data ownership and efficient queries. User-specific data like profiles and products are stored in a way that naturally aligns with security rules (e.g., a user can only write to their own /users/{userId} document). Storing products in a subcollection under the user who created them makes it easy to list all products for a specific business. The top-level 'categories' collection is for globally accessible data. This design is scalable and secure.
